striped.h: Make some of the elements filled with stripes

striped_partial.t: Percentage of only partially striped among them

w_min.h: Lower limit of random size of the object

w_max.h: Upper limit of random size of the object

p_outlined.h: Object that will not be filled with color

p_gradient.h: Gradient fill will be used instead of solid color, but only when the object is not outlined

layers_min.t: Min number of layers per iteration (counting from 0)
layers_min.h: Number of object layers, 0 means one layer, lower limit

layers_max.t: Max number of layers per iteration (counting from 0)
layers_max.h: Number of object layers, 0 means one layer, upper limit

triangular.h: Geometric patterns with the basic shape of triangle and each next row is shifted horizontally.

w_min.h: Lower limit of random size of the object

w_max.h: Upper limit of random size of the object

sharp.t: Percentage of sharp edges for rhombuses
sharp.h: Rhombic objects edges are rounded by default, this option makes them sharp

p_outlined.h: Object that will not be filled with color

p_gradient.h: Gradient fill will be used instead of solid color

square.h: Geometric patterns with the basic shape of square, i.e. simple 2d matrix of objects.

sets_x_max.h: Maximum number of horizontal sets of elements in pattern (not inclusive)

sets_y_max.h: Maximum number of vertical sets of elements in pattern (not inclusive)

p_regular.h: By default randomized linear objects are created instead of dots/lines

w_multiplier.h: Width of dots/lines will by multiplied by this value (1 for none)

h_multiplier.h: Height of dots/lines will by multiplied by this value (1 for none)

extrusion.t: Percentage of disks with a hole
extrusion.h: Objects will have a random-sized holein the middle

p_gradient.h: Circular gradient fill will be used instead of solid color

text.t: Percentage of circles with a caption
text.h: Random word will be placed in the middle of the object

p_opaque.h: Transparency level will be set to zero for those objects

p_outlined.h: Object that will not be filled with color

multiplier.h: Object's w/h will by multiplied by this value

variation.h: Random size multiplier between 1 and this value will be applied (set to 1 if you want all the objects to be the same scale)

text_light.t: Render text to light canvas as well
text_light.h: Captions will be rendered on to the second dedicated canvas

additive.t: Fixed white tone for all objects
additive.h: Color will be set to pure white for all the objects, just the opacity level will be random

text.t: Percentage of hexagons with a caption
text.h: Random word will be placed in the middle of the object

p_outlined.h: Object that will not be filled with color

p_gradient.h: Circular gradient fill will be used instead of solid color

p_cubes.h: Draw cube-looking objects instead of plane hexagons

multiplier.h: Object's w/h will by multiplied by this value (1 for none)

variation.h: Random size multiplier between 1 and this value will be applied (set to 1 if you want all the objects to be the same scale)

text_light.t: Render text to light canvas as well
text_light.h: Captions will be rendered on to the second dedicated canvas

additive.t: Fixed white tone for all objects
additive.h: Color will be set to pure white for all the objects, just the opacity level will be random

multiplier.h: Dot's w/h will by multiplied by this value (1 for none)

w_multiplier.h: Dot's w will by multiplied by this value (1 for none)

circle.h: Round dots instead of rectangular ones

rectangle.t: Percentage of perfect square dots for non-square ones
rectangle.h: Dots that will have equal width and height (only working for non-round ones), by default shape is rectangular, but not square

p_tone.h: Randomize brightness in b/w mode

p_skips.h: Do not draw some of the dots

sets_y.h: Number of rows in dot matrix

sets_x.h: Number of columns in dot matrix

in_set.t: Max num dots in each set
in_set.h: Number of dots in each column

hue_min.h: Minimum hue degree for colorized dots

hue_max.h: Maximum hue degree for colorized dots

whole.h: Dots/lines are placed all over the canvas ignoreing number of sets, dots in set etc.

light_canvas.t: Render to light canvas as well
light_canvas.h: Dots will be rendered on to the second dedicated canvas

p_opaque.h: Transparency level will be set to zero for those objects

p_outlined.h: Object that will not be filled with color

svgs.h:
Various objects from svg images. Two pack of meshes were taken from jsplacement tool! More to follow.
This template might be really slow sometimes!

caves.t: Percentage of rectangles with circle-shaped extrusions

pins.h: Does not work for rotated and beveled rectangles

text.t: Percentage of rectangles with a caption
text.h: Random word will be placed in the middle of the object

rotate.t: Percentage of rectangles that will be rotated 45Â°

opaque.h: Transparency level will be set to zero for those objects

p_outlined.h: Object that will not be filled with color

striped.h: Make some of the elements filled with stripes

w_multiplier.h: Object's width will be multiplied by this value, 1 for none

h_multiplier.h: Object's height will be multiplied by this value, 1 for none

text_light.t: Render text to light canvas as well
text_light.h: Captions will be rendered on to the second dedicated canvas

additive.t: Fixed white tone for all objects
additive.h: Color will be set to pure white for all the objects, just the opacity level will be random

m_max.h: Range of object's w/h max values

h_multiplier.h: Object will become more spread diagonally

w_multiplier.h: Object will become more spread horizonally/vertically

p_outlined.h: Object that will not be filled with color

text.h: Random word will be placed in the middle of the object

w_multiplier.h: Pattern width will by multiplied by this value

h_multiplier.h: Pattern height will by multiplied by this value

variation.h: Random width multiplier between 1 and this value will be applied (set to 1 if you want all the columns to be the same scale)

p_gradient.h: Gradient fill will be used instead of solid color

p_rcolor.h: Solid color will be random instead of static

p_gradient.h: Gradient fill will be used instead of solid color

p_missing.h: Some objects will be completely invisible

divisions.h: Canvas gets randomly divided into squares
